ChiefComplaints: Fatigue requiring midday naps despite adequate sleep
Unexplained 12 lb weight loss over 4 months

2023-09-15.Notes: Complaint of fever (101.2°F) & dry cough. Dx: Suspected viral URI. CBC: WBC 11.2k/μL (H), lymphs 18% (L). Rapid flu/COVID-19 neg. Rx: Hydration, NSAIDs.

2023-10-03.Notes: Persistent fatigue. Normal CMP except ALT 68 U/L (H). CRP 12 mg/L (H). Chest XR: Clear. Dx: Post-viral syndrome. Rx: Rest.

2023-11-17.Notes: Migratory arthralgia. RF <20 IU/mL, ANA 1:80 speckled. Uric acid 5.1 mg/dL. Dx: Undifferentiated connective tissue disorder? Trial prednisone 10mg - minimal improvement.

2024-01-08.Notes: Reported annular erythema (photo reviewed). No active rash present. Punch biopsy (site healed): Non-specific dermal inflammation. Direct immunofluorescence neg.

2024-02-14.Notes: Palpitations. Echo: EF 60%, mild pericardial effusion. Holter: Occasional PVCs. Troponin <0.01 ng/mL. Advised reduce caffeine.

2024-03-22.Notes: Complaint of facial twitching. Normal brain MRI. Lyme AB (ELISA): Positive IgG/IgM. Western Blot: 5/10 IgG bands, 2/3 IgM. CDC criteria not met. LP pending.

2024-03-29.Notes: CSF analysis: WBC 22/μL (90% lymphs), protein 55 mg/dL. CSF IgG index elevated. Borrelia PCR: Pending.
